com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api

Class VerificationRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api.VerificationRequest

  • public class VerificationRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A value object requesting that the CreditCard be verified by indicating the creditcard elements, such as AVS and CVV2, that should be verified.
    Since:
    JSE5

      Creates an instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VerificationRequest

        public VerificationRequest(AvsRequest avsRequest,
                   Cvv2Request cvv2Request)
        Creates an instance.
        Parameters:
        avsRequest - indicates how to verify the address. If null, then ignore the address (street/zip) of the creditCard and don't verify it.
        cvv2Request - indicates how to verify the CVV2. If null, then ignore the CVV2 value of the creditCard and don't verify it.

      • VerificationRequest

        public VerificationRequest(AvsRequest avsRequest,
                   Cvv2Request cvv2Request,
                   AdvancedRiskProfile advancedRiskProfile)
        Creates an instance.
        Parameters:
        avsRequest - indicates how to verify the address. If null, then ignore the address (street/zip) of the creditCard and don't verify it.
        cvv2Request - indicates how to verify the CVV2. If null, then ignore the CVV2 value of the creditCard and don't verify it.
        advancedRiskProfile - indicates how to verify the AdvancedRiskProfile. If null, then ignore the AdvancedRiskProfile specific fields and dont verify them.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvsRequest

        public AvsRequest getAvsRequest()
        Returns:
        the AvsRequest or null if AVS is not enabled

      • getCvv2Request

        public Cvv2Request getCvv2Request()
        Returns:
        the Cvv2Request or null if CVV2 is not enabled

      • getAdvancedRiskProfile

        public AdvancedRiskProfile getAdvancedRiskProfile()
        Returns:
        the AdvancedRiskProfile or null if AdvancedRiskProfile is not enabled
